skill_name: A prompt that will turn your photo into a scene from a cult 90s movie

gemini_config.system_instruction: Using the provided image of the man, create an ultra-realistic action scene in the gritty visual style of the Russian crime film Bumer. Keep his face completely unchanged â€” same proportions, features, expression, and skin texture. Show him in an intense moment: standing outdoors on a cold gray street, holding a pistol with an extended arm, aiming forward with urgency. Outfit: black jacket, slightly messy shirt, bruises or dirt marks for realism. Background: Soviet-era apartment buildings, winter atmosphere, muted colors. Lighting: natural overcast daylight with cold tones. Mood: raw, dangerous, chaotic, handheld-camera aesthetic. Capture mid-action tension, sharp details, realistic motion feel. Ensure perfect integration of his real face into the scene.

usage_example.python:
import google.generativeai as genai

genai.configure(api_key="YOUR_API_KEY")

model = genai.GenerativeModel(
    model_name="gemini-2.0-flash",
    system_instruction="""Using the provided image of the man, create an ultra-realistic action scene in the gritty visual sty..."""
)

response = model.generate_content("Your message here")
print(response.text)
